descriptionlist.description: Reads various files dropped by unc0ver that provide some useful information like the kernel slide.

screenshot.description: This is kerntool running in NewTerm2 on an iPhone 5s (11.4.1) running the Electra jailbreak.
This is kerntool running in NewTerm2 on an iPhone 7 (12.1.1) running the unc0ver dark jailbreak.
This is kerntool running in NewTerm2 on an iPhone 5s (12.0) running the Chimera jailbreak.

changelog.change: Add Sileo depiction to control file
Add detection for Cydia package manager for new functionality
Add option --cydia-log to read "cydia.log" to console
